### Usage

**Hyprland binds:**

```properties
$MOD = SUPER

bind = $MOD, A, exec, ~/.config/rofi/scripts/rofi.sh A  # app launcher
bind = $MOD, V, exec, ~/.config/rofi/scripts/rofi.sh V  # clipboard
bind = $MOD, X, exec, ~/.config/rofi/scripts/rofi.sh X  # calculator
bind = $MOD, M, exec, ~/.config/rofi/scripts/rofi.sh M  # emoji picker
bind = $MOD, W, exec, ~/.config/rofi/scripts/rofi.sh W  # window switcher
```
